text: My favourite clinic with my favourite dentist Dr Cheryl as usual. Dr Cheryl and her staffs have always give me assurance, clear information given. It really made the dental appointment not the fearless one but more looking forward one. Another comfortable experience

I recently had a wonderful experience at Q&M Dental. The staff, particularly the ladies assisting with teeth cleaning, were exceptionally friendly and professional. They made the entire process comfortable and efficient, ensuring I was at ease throughout my visit. The clinic itself was clean and well-maintained, creating a welcoming environment. Their attention to detail and patient care was evident, as they meticulously cleaned my teeth and provided personalized advice on dental hygiene. I highly recommend Q&M Dental for anyone looking for top-notch dental care delivered with a warm and caring touch.
Thr clinic staffs are very friendly and location is very convenient for most of people. Dentist is very skillfull and recommend. Clinic is very clean and great place for sure!

I am so happy with the service here! I have had anxiety with dentist for as long as I can remember. I hated alllll my dentist previously!! Dr Chasina has been so patient and helpful that by each visit I feel more confident to go and my visits are pleasant! I can’t recommend her enough!! Thankyou for making the journey so calming for me.

The clinic environment is very clean, bright, comfy especially the location is great as it is inside the mall. While waiting, you still can shop around. It make us feel that the waiting time is bearable. Clinic Staffs esp Li Wen and Dr Cheryl Goh are very friendly and approachable. Her smiling face put a smile on my face too. It make me feel comfortable. Enjoyed interacting with them. High recommendation for this outlet for any tooth related issue. I will definitely make this outlet as my first choice. There is a reason why they deserve a five star rating. The whole experience is a smoothing and excellent.
